overview: Frank, highly successful coach in the mid 80's, but his forced retirement due to match-fixing, forced him to stay away from the world of soccer. In other side, Matt, a good kid, good grades, got into a problem with some rude, older boys. Matt and his friends are forced to get into a game they don't want to loose. Matt see's in Frank his only hope.  Will they have what it takes?
title: The Pursuit Of Victory
